body_html:
I am facing this issue on custom dataset, I followed the instructions here. Although the model is built successfully and the prediction works on my laptop, but when I load it on virtual phone or real phone it crashes complaining 'Tensorflow Demo Keeps Stopping".

Also, if i try to use the model built as in the article, I do not have any issue at all.

Tensorflow version is 1.7.0, MacOS Darwin Kernel Version 17.5.0.

4-25 21:35:55.768 22435-22435/org.tensorflow.demo I/TensorFlowImageClassifier: Read 6 labels, output layer size is 6

at android.os.Handler.dispatchMessage(Handler.java:99)
at android.os.Looper.loop(Looper.java:164)

body_text:
I am facing this issue on custom dataset, I followed the instructions here. Although the model is built successfully and the prediction works on my laptop, but when I load it on virtual phone or real phone it crashes complaining 'Tensorflow Demo Keeps Stopping".
Also, if i try to use the model built as in the article, I do not have any issue at all.
Tensorflow version is 1.7.0, MacOS Darwin Kernel Version 17.5.0.

body:
I am facing this issue on custom dataset, I followed the instructions [here](https://hackernoon.com/building-an-insanely-fast-image-classifier-on-android-with-mobilenets-in-tensorflow-dc3e0c4410d4). Although the model is built successfully and the prediction works on my laptop, but when I load it on virtual phone or real phone it crashes complaining 'Tensorflow Demo Keeps Stopping". 

Also, if i try to use the model built as in the [article](https://hackernoon.com/building-an-insanely-fast-image-classifier-on-android-with-mobilenets-in-tensorflow-dc3e0c4410d4), I do not have any issue at all. 

 Tensorflow version is 1.7.0, MacOS Darwin Kernel Version 17.5.0. 



4-25 21:35:55.768 22435-22435/org.tensorflow.demo I/TensorFlowImageClassifier: Read 6 labels, output layer size is 6
04-25 21:35:55.773 22435-22435/org.tensorflow.demo I/tensorflow: ClassifierActivity: Camera orientation relative to screen canvas: 90
04-25 21:35:55.774 22435-22435/org.tensorflow.demo I/tensorflow: ClassifierActivity: Initializing at size 640x480
04-25 21:35:55.776 22435-22435/org.tensorflow.demo E/zygote: No implementation found for void org.tensorflow.demo.env.ImageUtils.convertYUV420SPToARGB8888(byte[], int[], int, int, boolean) (tried Java_org_tensorflow_demo_env_ImageUtils_convertYUV420SPToARGB8888 and Java_org_tensorflow_demo_env_ImageUtils_convertYUV420SPToARGB8888___3B_3IIIZ)

        at org.tensorflow.demo.ClassifierActivity$2.run(ClassifierActivity.java:166)
        at android.os.Handler.handleCallback(Handler.java:819)
        at android.os.Handler.dispatchMessage(Handler.java:99)
        at android.os.Looper.loop(Looper.java:164)
        at android.os.HandlerThread.run(HandlerThread.java:65)
04-25 21:35:56.117 22435-22533/org.tensorflow.demo V/StudioProfiler: Acquiring Application for Events
